resources.string: What would you like to be tested on?

Select a 10 question Trivia Assessment between 3 categories. Once Selected you have to select between one of the 4 multiple choices provided. After completetion of assessment will get redirected to a score fragment where user score will be listed aswell as buttons to either play again or leave app
This Trivia is all about putting in fundamental android development concepts such as MVVM, JSON API and Retrofit into use to understand how it all comes together
